snippet.title: Clumsy Ninja - Kira and Lily Trailer
snippet.description:
Meet Lily and continue your search for Kira in the latest update for Clumsy Ninja! Available now for free on the App Store and Google Play. Download Clumsy Ninja here: http://nmgam.es/CLNYT1

- New customisable suits!
- Collect 30+ exclusive story cards!
- Track your search for Kira in the all new Ninja Book!
- Join the ninja and his friends in the Winter Event and win exclusive suits!
- Collect candy when you train!
- Earn suits for each character!

___________________________________

Meet Clumsy Ninja, the most hapless ninja ever to grace a touchscreen! Train him, throw him, tickle him, and even tie balloons to him. Everything you do will make Clumsy Ninja more skillful, and help him find his missing friend, Kira. 

Clumsy Ninja is the next generation of interactive characters! He can sense, feel, move, and react uniquely every time. Prepare to be amazed…oh, and please take good care of him!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/clumsygame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/clumsygame
Instagram: https://instagram.com/clumsyninjagame/
